name: The Glimmering Woods
description:
Summary On a tiny island off the coast of Great Buttern
Lay the town of Pattyport and its starchy mansions
Good-natured were its people, but at an odd they’d turn
To mistrust, gossip and superstition.

Among those villagers was a lad of little fear
Who one day wandered into the woods up north
With wit and courage, yet he would not go forth
For a wounded creature was soon to appear.

Take care of a mysterious blue-eyed creature that might just make your fellow villagers lose patience, in this top-down adventure made by comic book artists NoTruche and Pekolio, animator Un ornithorynque dans la piscine and programmer Kyrio for Ludum Dare 46. You can rate our game using the "View submission" link above, or right here.

All graphics, designs and code were created during the Jam, with the help of the BitPotion font by Joeb Rogers and music by Jason Shaw.

We used such awesome software as Godot, Aseprite and Tilesetter.

Controls
  • Arrow keys: Move your character
  • Space: Interact (talk, progress in dialogue, etc.)
